Reviews.Title: “What a dump!”
Reviews.Author: iamjewelsmom
Reviews.Content: dh booked nonsmoking online 4 nights smoking double bed available horror flick wreaked stale cigarettes window screen floor window lamp bed fell apart tried ceiling light fixture bulb furniture miniature mismatched oldstyle tv blurry outside building smelled industrial spillage sort parking lot poor lighting fearful getting sketchy individuals loitering frig barely fit standard takeout container curious advertised extended stay accommodations cant buy groceries properly store frig checked 30 mins moved radisson airport lobby complaining keys refund

Reviews.Title: “Nothing fancy, but very good value for the budget traveller”
Reviews.Author: MOF
Reviews.Content: stayed week nov 2010 town nascar race impressed front desk staff late check smoothly staff contact polite eager please carpet little worn kitchen facilities minimal bed shower neighbors little noisy bad complain management location block interstate 10 access traffic noise 15 minutes car return booked online hotel 2 months advance price week hi speed wireless internet additonal 5 week cant beat

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: disney8486
Reviews.Content: purpose staying studios enjoy 5star luxury definitely didnt location hotel ok fairly quiet street little dimly lit near major businesses outside hotel racy lot shady people hanging parking lot nights stayed hotel wife little uneasy actual fine quaint accomodating youre looking sleep fine pretty clean bed comfortable walls paper thin listened conversations heard tvs adjacent throughout night night requested hideaway bed soft friend sleep dont carry brought extra comforter didnt expect special didnt special total 40night budget trip budget trip stay studios probably fork little sleep
